name: Sword & Dragon Demo
description:
VERY EARLY WIP!!
This is a betademo including only 1 boss fight that you can try in 4 difficulty modes. The boss combat patterns are not yet finished, so you won't see big difference between normal/hard/warrior difficulty modes. You have already charge attack in this demo, but you would have to unlock it in the real game. Mapping input menu is still a bit messy, working on it. Hope you'll enjoy it.
